{{disambig-two: '''''Gates of Mordor''''' is a supplement (in the ''Ready-to-Run Adventure''-series) for ''[[Middle-earth Role Playing]]'', 1st Edition.
Three low-to-mid level adventures which each stand on their own and can be set up in minutes.

A shipment of wine and ale has disappeared in North Ithilien. Firichal, a wealthy wine merchant has offered a reward for information and assistance. Are you brave enough to follow the Trail of the Wine Bandits?

The tower of Barad Perras once withstood the efforts of besieging Orcs. Years later it was abandoned and forgotten... Recently, however, a band of Scara-hai Orcs has claimed the tower as a base from which to terrorize the area. Are you willing to face The Trouble at Littlehorn?
